wikipedia_page.main: Ian Le Marquand or Bryan Ian Le Marquand (born 18 September 1951) is a Jersey politician, Deputy Chief Minister, Minister for Home Affairs, and former magistrate.

response: The number of Senators will be reduced to eight in the October 2014 elections. As part of the transitional arrangements for this new electoral system, the six Senators elected for six-year terms in 2008 did not face election in 2011.Senators Bryan Ian Le Marquand, Alan Breckon, Alan Maclean, Paul Routier, Philip Ozouf Jr and Sarah Ferguson.
*Bryan Ian Le Marquand, Minister for Home Affairs for States of Jersey and former magistrate
